            stroke="none"

          />
        </g>
      </g>
    </svg>
    <p class="text-ui-text font-sans font-medium text-2xl">
      The window period is a time during which an HIV test may not be able to
      confirm whether someone has been exposed to HIV
    </p>

     The window period can be from <span className='text-red'>10 days to 3 months,</span> depending on the person’s body and the type of HIV test used

  </g>
</svg>

    <p class="text-ui-text font-sans font-medium text-2xl">
     If someone has HIV in their body during the window period,<span className='text-red'> it can still pass to others </span> even though test results are negative
    </p>
